an6.57:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an6.57:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.57:1.4: kanhabhijati pannatta, nilabhijati pannatta, lohitabhijati pannatta, haliddabhijati pannatta, sukkabhijati pannatta, paramasukkabhijati pannatta.
an6.57:2.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena kanhabhijati pannatta, orabbhika sukarika sakunika magavika ludda macchaghataka cora coraghataka bandhanagarika ye va panannepi keci kururakammanta.
an6.57:3.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena nilabhijati pannatta, bhikkhu kantakavuttika ye va panannepi keci kammavada kriyavada.
an6.57:4.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena lohitabhijati pannatta, nigantha ekasataka.
an6.57:5.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena haliddabhijati pannatta, gihi odatavasana acelakasavaka.
an6.57:6.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena sukkabhijati pannatta, ajivaka ajivakiniyo.
an6.57:7.1: Tatridam, bhante, puranena kassapena paramasukkabhijati pannatta, nando vaccho kiso sankicco makkhali gosalo.
an6.57:8.1: Puranena, bhante, kassapena ima chalabhijatiyo pannatta”ti.
an6.57:9.1: “Kim panananda, puranassa kassapassa sabbo loko etadabbhanujanati ima chalabhijatiyo pannapetun”ti?
an6.57:9.3: Seyyathapi, ananda, puriso daliddo assako analhiko, tassa akamakassa bilam olaggeyyum: ‘idam te, ambho purisa, mamsanca khaditabbam, mulanca anuppadatabban’ti.
an6.57:9.4: Evamevam kho, ananda, puranena kassapena appatinnaya etesam samanabrahmananam ima chalabhijatiyo pannatta, yatha tam balena abyattena akhettannuna akusalena.
an6.57:10.2: Tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an6.57:10.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
an6.57:10.6: Idhananda, ekacco kanhabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:10.7: Idha panananda, ekacco kanhabhijatiyo samano sukkam dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:10.8: Idha panananda, ekacco kanhabhijatiyo samano akanham asukkam nibbanam abhijayati.
an6.57:10.9: Idha panananda, ekacco sukkabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:10.10: Idha panananda, ekacco sukkabhijatiyo samano sukkam dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:10.11: Idha panananda, ekacco sukkabhijatiyo samano akanham asukkam nibbanam abhijayati.
an6.57:11.1: Kathancananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati?
an6.57:11.2: Idhananda, ekacco nice kule paccajato hoti—candalakule va nesadakule va venakule va rathakarakule va pukkusakule va, dalidde appannapanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghasacchado labbhati.
an6.57:11.3: So ca hoti dubbanno duddasiko okotimako bavhabadho kano va kuni va khanjo va pakkhahato va, na labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
an6.57:11.4: So kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an6.57:11.5: So kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an6.57:11.6: Evam kho, ananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:12.1: Kathancananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano sukkam dhammam abhijayati?
an6.57:12.2: Idhananda, ekacco nice kule paccajato hoti—candalakule va …pe…
an6.57:12.4: So kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
an6.57:12.5: So kayena sucaritam caritva, vacaya sucaritam caritva, manasa sucaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an6.57:12.6: Evam kho, ananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano sukkam dhammam abhijayati.
an6.57:13.1: Kathancananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano akanham asukkam nibbanam abhijayati?
an6.57:13.2: Idhananda, ekacco nice kule paccajato hoti—candalakule va …pe…
an6.57:13.3: so ca hoti dubbanno duddasiko okotimako.
an6.57:13.4: So kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajati.
an6.57:13.5: So evam pabbajito samano panca nivarane pahaya cetaso upakkilese pannaya dubbalikarane, catusu satipatthanesu suppatitthitacitto, satta bojjhange yathabhutam bhavetva akanham asukkam nibbanam abhijayati.
an6.57:13.6: Evam kho, ananda, kanhabhijatiyo samano akanham asukkam nibbanam abhijayati.
an6.57:14.1: Kathancananda, sukkabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati?
an6.57:14.2: Idhananda, ekacco ucce kule paccajato hoti—khattiyamahasalakule va brahmanamahasalakule va gahapatimahasalakule va, addhe mahaddhane mahabhoge pahutajataruparajate pahutavittupakarane pahutadhanadhanne.
an6.57:14.3: So ca hoti abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato, labhi annassa panassa vatthassa yanassa malagandhavilepanassa seyyavasathapadipeyyassa.
an6.57:14.4: So kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati.
an6.57:14.5: So kayena duccaritam caritva, vacaya duccaritam caritva, manasa duccaritam caritva kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an6.57:14.6: Evam kho, ananda, sukkabhijatiyo samano kanham dhammam abhijayati.
